```{r}
library(gemtc)
data(smoking)

as.numeric(c(pi_a, pi_b, pi_c, pi_d))
```

```{r}
cons.model <- mtc.model(smoking, type="consistency", likelihood="binom", link="logit", linearModel="random")
cons.out <- mtc.run(cons.model, n.adapt=20000, n.iter=50000, thin=1)
summary(cons.out)
```
